text: Didsbury is a area of Manchester 5-6 miles south of the city centre. According to the 2001 census it had a population of 14,292. == References == == Other websites == * Fetch Didsbury — resources, events and articles educating people about Didsbury. * Didsbury Life Web Site — articles of interest to those living in or visiting Didsbury. * Official Didsbury statistics from 2001 Census Category:Districts of Manchester
title: Didsbury
